name: Condemned (itch) (Taneim, grexzi, ec3938, jbekk, az2306)
description:
by Jessica Bek, Evie Cundy, Taneim Miah, Regina Wu, Anna Zheng

CONTROLS

WASD -> Movement, MOUSE AIM LEFT CLICK -> Punch/Throw, RIGHT CLICK -> Chain Zipline, F -> Pick up Object, E -> Talk To NPC

Controls to switch between levels: 1->Start Room, 2 -> Start of Level 1 Design, 3 -> Talk To NPCs, 4->Sandbox

LORE

You are a prisoner of the first circle of Hell freed by a strange benefactor who gives you a new purpose in death - fighting your way down to the ninth circle using the chains that once held you captive to uncover the origin of the strange rifts that have been freeing the terrible beasts within.
